name: Mariana
description:
Mariana is a fast-paced shoot-em-up with a twist. Instead of shooting bullets at your enemies, harvest your enemies' weapons and use them against them!

Mariana is Windows exclusive! All assets (excluding Streamster font by Youssef Habchi) by Phoenix Hulett and various Google Images searches.

This game made in ten days as a test project. If there is any significant interest I would love to extend this into a full game.
